data.text: @tomaskenn @thehill Life’s a choice. Make good ones.

@tomaskenn @thehill Thomas, you're not a leftist. You're just a DNC shill indulging in the virtue-signaling Putin-reductive narrative  that will only serve the warmongers. Maybe you should stfu and recognize the history of NATO and American Imperialism.
@tomaskenn @thehill “Let it go”??? Would the US “let it go” if someone invaded OUR country?? F* NO!!!
@tomaskenn @thehill @KimIversenShow ...I bet you would say that to all rape survivors too.  Awful.  Truly awful.

@tomaskenn @thehill One of democracy's "problems" is that stupid people get to say stupid stuff and nothing should be done to stop them from showing how stupid they are. It's also what makes democracy great.
@tomaskenn @BudGothmog44 @thehill They are too stupid to get embarrassed.
@tomaskenn @thehill That’s why I don’t read nor support that trash site/ organization
@tomaskenn @thehill @thehill has been pushing Putin's agenda regarding Ukraine for years
@tomaskenn @thehill I blocked the hill a long time ago. This is why
